long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wish you could read more, only if it took less time, effort and energy?

FeedZap helps you consume your books through a healthy, snackable feed,
so that you can read more with less time, effort and energy.

FeedZap is for you if you...
- struggle to maintain a regular reading habit
- wish you could remember and apply more from your readings
- want to learn new ideas and concepts with less effort
- would like to avoid boredom when learning new topics
- face distractions and wish to focus more
- feel like you lack time to read full-length books

FeedZap will work great for you, if you are a..
- Curious Student
- Persistent Researcher
- Competitive Exam Aspirant
- Busy Professional
- Time-strapped Business Person
- Avid Reader

Transform your personal library into a healthy feed:
FeedZap transforms your favorite books and documents into healthy feeds in your browser/phone.
- Excerpts from all your books is combined into one engaging feed
- Designed to help you read on the go
- Works everywhere - Desktop, Android, iOS, Chrome Extension

Consume large books and docs in byte sized chunks
- In the modern digital environment, attention spans have reduced
- FeedZap chunks your books into snackable pieces of content
- You will be able to work through more content, with less effort


Read anytime, anywhere
- Waiting in a queue? You can work through a few pieces of your to-read list.
- Half-awake, about to get out of bed? Read some insights from your favorites
- Travelling through the city? Enjoy a few paragraphs from great works

Transform distraction into learning
- On average, people spend about an hour per day in online social/news media
- FeedZap is an alternative to sinking time into mindless scrolling
- Optionally, FeedZap can replace your social media feeds with healthy feeds

FEATURES

- Healthy Feed
- Upload Sources
- Zoom Into Book
- Manage Sources
- Dark Mode
- Sentence Highlighting based on text rank
- Share content with friends and families
- Star favourite content
- More!

Act now, to overcome your challenges
- Most people spend at least an hour on social media, on any given day. FeedZap helps you get better habits.
- Most people find it difficult to form good reading habits. FeedZap makes reading seamless.
- Most people abandon their learning journeys often. FeedZap keeps you consistent.
- Most people struggle focus on learning. FeedZap keeps your focus, and turns distraction to learning.

Learn more at: https://hexmos.com/feedzap
